alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bayard to near World Golf Village to near Saint Augustine South. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Saint Augustine Beach, Nocatee, Durbin, Vilano Beach, South Ponte Vedra, Bayard, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach and Saint Augustine South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval
